title: Shelborne Hotel Miami Beach Logo
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150410092518im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SHELBORNE_5493.jpg)

Can anyone help me identify this typeface form the Shelborne Hotel's logo? Concurso Italian, Examiner NF, and Huxley Vert come close, but aren't right. Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks,

WB
author: WilsonBunker

comments.content:
Can anyone help me identify this typeface form the Shelborne Hotel's logo? Concurso Italian, Examiner NF, and Huxley Vert come close, but aren't right. Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks,

WB

Wasn't able to find to spot a match and the closest I have in stock is Concurso Italian. As nobody else answers, maybe it'd be not so hazardous to conclude it's a custom logo which I have to admit would not surprise me.
